channel.description: Recent content in Kubernetes on Tech Blog

item.description: Kuberntes Memo # Basics # kubectl create -f <nanifest file(s)> kubectl apply -f <nanifest file(s)> kubectl delete -f <nanifest file(s)> kubectl get <ObjectType> kubectl describe <ObjectType> <ObjectName> kubectl get <ObjectType> <ObjectName> minikube start --driver=docker minikube status kubectl version
